notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: Z.S., F.L., and D.W. designed the study; Z.S. and Y.G. analyzed the transcriptome data, R.L. performed virus infection and RNA extraction; Z.R. performed the virus titration experiment; C.H. performed virus infection, and RT-qPCR assay to quantify gene-expression; Z.S., F.L., and D.W. writingâ€”original draft preparation. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
